title: Why You Always Lion
description:
Mina and Justis Mosqueda of Acme Packing Co look ahead to the best matchups in Week 3 including Packers-Bucs, 49ers-Broncos, Lions-Vikings, Bills-Dolphins, and more.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
